content: {"Name": "Sister Maureen Joyce Food Pantry", "Entity_Id": 88, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Sister Maureen Joyce", "More_Information": "guests can utilize pantry 1-2 a month \r\nMust call for an appointment, client choice \r\nSoup Kitchen: Monday & Thursday 11:45-12:45", "Counties": ["Albany"], "Location": "Albany", "Address": "315 Sheridan Avenue", "City": "Albany", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12206", "Phone": "518-314-0859", "Hours_of_Operation": "Tues/Wed/Fri 9:00-1:00pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "http://www.ccrcda.org/get_help/Food-Nutrition_27_service.htm", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.660673", "Longitude": "-73.7641912", "Last_Updated": "03-10-2025", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
